values.label: Ship on authorization
values.comment: A delivery requirement indicating the items should not be shipped without specific authorization.

values.label: Ship partial - balance back order
values.comment: Partial shipping is allowed. The rest of the order should be delivered as soon as possible.

values.label: Cancel if not delivered by date
values.comment: An order or the rest of an order should be cancelled if not delivered at specified date.

values.label: Do not deliver after
values.comment: A requirement that an order should not be delivered after a specified date/time.

values.label: Do not deliver before
values.comment: A requirement that an order should not be delivered before a specified date/time.

values.label: Deliver on date
values.comment: An order should be delivered exactly on specified date.

values.label: Substitute item
values.comment: A substitute item may be delivered, if the ordered item is not available.

values.label: Ship as soon as possible
values.comment: The order should be delivered as soon as possible.

values.label: Ship complete order
values.comment: The order should be delivered only complete, not partial.

values.label: Ship partial, if no freight rate increase
values.comment: Partial shipping of an order is allowed, if the total freight rate do not increase.

values.label: Ship partial - balance cancel
values.comment: Partial shipping is allowed. The rest of the order should be cancelled.
